feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 07:23 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: N 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13.
